title: Login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that the login is successful when any valid email and password with 6 or more characters are entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page at /giris
Enter a valid email address
Enter a password with 6 or more characters
Click the login button
Verify successful login and redirection to the dashboard page /genel

title: Login failure with short password
description: Verify that login submissions with passwords fewer than 6 characters are rejected with validation error.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page at /giris
Enter any valid email address
Enter a password with fewer than 6 characters
Attempt to click the login button
Verify that a validation error message is shown and login is blocked

title: Dashboard statistics and charts are displayed correctly
description: Verify the dashboard overview page shows total donations, active members, pending applications statistics, monthly donation and aid distribution charts, and recent donations list accurately.

steps.description: Log in successfully and navigate to the dashboard page /genel
Check that statistics cards for total donations, active members, and pending applications are visible and display correct data
Verify monthly donations and monthly aid distribution charts render with correct data
Confirm recent donations list is populated and displays recent data

title: Donations list filtering, sorting, searching, and pagination
description: Verify donations list page supports filtering by status and purpose, sorting on all applicable columns, text search, and pagination functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to the donations list page /bagis/liste
Apply filters by donation status
Verify list updates and only displays donations matching the status filter
Sort donations list by various columns such as date, amount, and donor
Confirm that the sorting order is applied correctly for each column
Use the search input to enter text query matching donor or purpose
Verify that the results match the search query correctly
Navigate through pagination controls to switch pages
Check that different pages show correct slice of donations list

title: Donations collection box (kumbara) overview and reports
description: Verify the kumbara overview page displays correct collection box data and the reports page generates accurate downloadable reports.

steps.description: Navigate to the donations collection box overview page /bagis/kumbara
Validate all collection boxes are listed with accurate amounts and status
Navigate to the donations reports page /bagis/raporlar
Generate a report with various filters and date ranges
Verify that the report displays correct aggregated donation data
Export report data to Excel
Confirm exported Excel file contains all visible report data with proper formatting

title: Members list filtering, searching, and dues tracking
description: Verify members listing supports filtering by member types, text search, correct pagination, and membership dues are tracked accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the members listing page /uyeler/liste
Apply filters by membership type
Verify members list refreshes correctly and shows only filtered types
Search members by name or ID
Confirm search results correctly match the query
Check the displayed membership dues status is accurate and up-to-date
Use pagination controls to navigate through members pages
Ensure different pages display correct members data

title: New member registration with form validation
description: Validate the new member registration form enforces all field validations, shows appropriate error messages, and successfully adds members when inputs are valid.

steps.description: Navigate to new member registration page /uyeler/yeni
Submit the form with empty required fields
Verify validation error messages are displayed for each missing required field
Enter invalid data in fields (such as invalid email or phone formats)
Check field-specific validation error messages appear
Fill form with valid data and submit
Confirm successful registration message and new member appears in members list

title: Social Aid beneficiary list and application management
description: Verify beneficiary list displays all relevant information, supports searching and filtering, and social aid applications are handled correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to social aid beneficiary list page /sosyal-yardim/ihtiyac-sahipleri
Check beneficiary list loads and shows expected details including immigration status, family structure, and health status
Use filters to narrow beneficiaries by status or other criteria
Verify list updates according to filter conditions
Search for beneficiaries by name or ID
Confirm search results are valid and relevant
Navigate to applications management page /sosyal-yardim/basvurular
Verify applications data is displayed correctly and application status can be updated

title: Social Aid payment tracking and statistics dashboard
description: Verify social aid payments are tracked accurately with correct listing and summary statistics on payments and overall aid distribution charts.

steps.description: Navigate to social aid payments page /sosyal-yardim/odemeler
Check payment records list loads correctly with relevant payment details
Navigate to social aid statistics page /sosyal-yardim/istatistikler
Validate charts and statistics summarize aid distribution data accurately

title: Responsive and collapsible sidebar navigation
description: Verify sidebar navigation is visible by default, can be collapsed and expanded, and responds properly on mobile devices.

steps.description: Log in and view any dashboard page
Confirm sidebar navigation is displayed and contains navigation links
Click sidebar toggle button to collapse sidebar
Verify sidebar collapses and main content adjusts accordingly
Click toggle button again to expand sidebar
Verify sidebar expands and main content layout reverts
Resize browser window to mobile width
Check sidebar becomes responsive for mobile, can be toggled, and navigation is usable

title: Breadcrumb navigation reflects current location
description: Verify breadcrumb navigation updates accurately with page context as user navigates the app modules.

steps.description: Navigate to dashboard page /genel
Check breadcrumb shows ‘Home > Genel’ or equivalent
Navigate to donations list /bagis/liste
Verify breadcrumb updates to ‘Home > Bagis > Liste’
Navigate to social aid beneficiary detail page
Confirm breadcrumb reflects full path including beneficiary ID

title: Data tables support sorting, filtering, searching, pagination, loading and empty states
description: Validate shared data table component functionality including column sorting, multi-criteria filtering, text searching, pagination controls, loading skeleton displays during data fetches, and empty state display when no data is available.

steps.description: Open any feature page with data table (e.g., donations list)
Change sorting on multiple columns and consecutive toggles of ascending/descending
Verify data rows reorder correctly according to selected sorting
Apply different filters simultaneously
Confirm table updates to display filtered rows only
Enter search text matching subset of data
Verify only matching rows shown
Paginate through data using controls
Check each page loads correct records
Trigger data reload that simulates loading state
Confirm loading skeleton placeholders visible during data fetch
Apply filter that yields no results
Verify empty state message/component is shown

title: Export to Excel functionality exports filtered table view correctly
description: Verify that exporting current table view data to Excel produces a correctly structured and formatted file matching displayed data and filters.

steps.description: Open a data table page (e.g., donations list) with filters applied
Trigger export-to-Excel action
Confirm an Excel file is downloaded
Validate the Excel content matches the current table's filtered and sorted data including column names and row values

title: Form validation applies correctly for donations, members, and social aid beneficiary forms
description: Tests all forms in donation, member registration, and beneficiary registration modules enforce field validations based on Zod schemas and provide user feedback on errors.

steps.description: Open donation form and submit empty form
Verify validation errors for required fields appear
Enter invalid data types or out-of-range values and submit
Confirm appropriate field validation errors are shown
Complete donation form with valid inputs and submit
Check form submits successfully without errors
Repeat above steps for members registration and social aid beneficiary forms
All relevant validation enforced and success submissions succeed

title: Mock service returns consistent sample data and supports pagination
description: Verify the mock API service layer returns sample data consistently for donations, members, beneficiaries, applications, and dashboard statistics, and supports pagination parameters correctly.

steps.description: Fetch donations list via mock service with default parameters
Verify a consistent set of sample donation records is returned
Fetch members, social aid beneficiaries, and application lists similarly
Confirm each returns sample data consistent on repeated calls
Query with pagination parameters to fetch page 2 or specific page sizes
Check that returned data is correct slice corresponding to pagination request

title: User session state managed correctly with cookie based authentication
description: Verify that after login, the user session state is stored in cookies, and protected routes block unauthorized access and reflect state properly.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials and verify cookie is set
Confirm cookie contains session token or relevant user session info
Access protected dashboard route after login and verify access
Ensure dashboard content is visible to authenticated user
Clear cookies or open new incognito window and try accessing protected routes
Confirm unauthorized access is redirected to login page

title: Page transitions and loading progress bar on route changes
description: Verify that page transitions trigger loading progress bar display and that it accurately reflects loading state during navigation.

steps.description: Navigate between multiple pages (dashboard, donations, members, social aid)
Check that progress bar appears at top when page is loading and disappears after load
Ensure transitions are smooth without UI glitches
